tool_description:
The Crowd Valley API is used to build online platforms and marketplaces globally for managing private placements, securities, real estate, crowdfunding, peer-to-peer lending, and public stock trading.

The public REST API provides an end to end server side application, which supports the technical back office requirements for client side applications of various kinds in the online investing and lending markets.

The Crowd Valley API also contains private financial back office functions and other services which are made available on request.
name: Crowd Valley
title: Crowd Valley

api_list.name: Crowd Valley API health status
api_list.description: Check the current health status of the Crowd Valley API.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://crowdvalley-crowd-valley-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crowdvalley-crowd-valley-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://crowdvalley-crowd-valley-v1.p.rapidapi.com/"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "crowdvalley-crowd-valley-v1.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Check the status of your network
api_list.description: Check that your network has been set up and is available through the API with your API key.

api_list.name: Logged-in user's account information
api_list.description: Populate information on an user's private account page.

api_list.name: Retrieve the user's investments
api_list.description: Retrieve a list of the user's investments. This will include open investment offers as well as closed investments.

api_list.name: The User's Organizations
api_list.description: A list of the logged-in User's Organizations. This could be used to show for which Organization(s) the User works or for which Organization(s) the User has created Offerings.

api_list.name: Visible Users in your network
api_list.description: Populate a public listing page of your visible Users. Users are visible if they have their Visibility field set to Open.

api_list.name: Retrieve a list of Organizations
api_list.description: A list of visible Organizations in the network. Implement this to show a list of Organizations that are supporting various deals, or that are umbrella entities for various users. This will only show Organizations that have visibility set to Open.

api_list.name: Retrieve information about this Organization
api_list.description: Information about the Organization. This will only work if the logged-in User is a team member of the Organization or the Organization has visibility set to Open.

api_list.name: Retrieve Offerings for this Organization
api_list.description: A list of visible Offerings for this Organization. Visible Offerings are those with status Restricted, Published, Live, Closing or Settled.

api_list.name: List of Offerings
api_list.description: Populate a live Offerings page or a historical/closed deals page. Visible Offerings are those with status Restricted, Published, Live, Closing or Settled.

api_list.name: Information about this Offering
api_list.description: Information about this Offering. This will only work if the Offering is visible in the network.

api_list.name: List of Investments for this Offering
api_list.description: Populate a list of Investments for this Offering. This can be used to show a list of current investors for this Offering. Investments will be shown in full if visibility is set to Open.

api_list.name: Information about this Investment
api_list.description: Information about this Investment. It will only work if the Investment has visibility set to Open or Anonymous.

api_list.name: Retrieve a User's public profile information
api_list.description: Populate a user's public profile information. Implement this to allow the logged-in user to see information about other users on the network. It will only populate all information if the target user's visibility is set to Open. This function will only show public profile information - it will not show private account information.
